Homes & Designs

  • Open Concept Kitchen

    Remodel Naperville, IL

    This home had a closed floorplan. We went in, took some walls, and optimized to floorplan to let in more natural light with enlarged windows and openings.

    View Process

  • Villa Tuscana

    Tuscan Naperville, IL

    This home is a completely custom build and serves as our model home. Everything was created from scratch, from the fireplace design to the furniture fabric selection.

    View Process

  • Grandma's Remodel

    Remodel Lisle, IL

    Helping out the family in 1995! This was an open concept remodel 'Queen Anne' style. Ceilings in this home were all raised extensively and wonderful archways merged rooms together.

    View Process

  • Cottingham Manor

    Country English Naperville, IL

    Were you to go to a home built 200 years ago in England, you would find quarter sawn oak. We used this unique wood throughout the house to give a distinct English feel.

    View Process

  • Villa Auignon

    French Country Naperville, IL

    A complete construction, Villa Auignon displays LJT Designs' ability to go from completely freeform design to real results.

    View Process
